name: Jess McCool
text: LOVE THIS PLACE! Whoever the Manager is, please recognize the two girls that were working the counter today as well as whoever made our pizza around 3:10PM. All Staff members were very kind and helpful and our pizza was one of the best i've ever had!! I can't wait to come back!

text: Never had a pizza from Hungry Howie‚Äôs in Tehachapi that wasn‚Äôt perfect! My favorite is the Cajun crust with some spicy toppings but of course ranch, garlic and others make every pizza great. One of the best run businesses in the area, pizza or otherwise.
